bug.author: Ark-kun
bug.summary: Deploying kubeflow produces 20000+ log lines making logs hard to read
bug.description: Excessive trace-level logging makes it very hard to locate the reason for failure. <denchmark-link:https://prow.k8s.io/view/gcs/kubernetes-jenkins/pr-logs/pull/kubeflow_pipelines/1379/kubeflow-pipeline-e2e-test/1131997673897857024>https://prow.k8s.io/view/gcs/kubernetes-jenkins/pr-logs/pull/kubeflow_pipelines/1379/kubeflow-pipeline-e2e-test/1131997673897857024</denchmark-link>

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Ark-kun>@Ark-kun</denchmark-link> Can you please clarify what logs you are looking for or what your use case is? I assume because you are referencing a prow job you mean the logs from the deploy script used in the E2E tests?

you mean the logs from the deploy script used in the E2E tests
